answers.answer: Sounds like preeclampsia. I had it HORRIBLY with.my first pregnancy. Good luck!

Yea it does sound like you have it. I was fine healthy pregnancatoll the way up to 38 weeks and 2 days later got it and was being induced and delivering my son. I wish the best for you and your little one.
Pregnancy all the way up to 38 weeks*
thanks im still going to hope its not i will just have to find out tomorrow though the lab said the results will come back the same day its not time for her to come out yet

question: Hi I was wondering if anyone hes had preeclampsia? this week i have gained 4 pounds and i have been so hungry but trying not to eat a lot because i have already gained 27 pounds at 31 weeks. Well today they said my blood pressure jumped a lot higher than normal so i have to do a 24 hour urine collection and a bunch of blood tests. my other symptoms have been cramping and nasty feeling in my stomach when i dont eat i just noticed during my nonstress test when i tried to focus on anything close to me my vision went blurry. has anybody had anything like this? could it just come on that fast because everything was normal tuesday besides gaining 2 pounds since friday now i gained 2 more since tuesday and its thursday and i do not want to have to go on bedrest. please tell me anything imm worried and my doctor didnt even see me just the nurse and she did not say a lot about it
title: possible preeclampsia?
